internal.content:
---
title: In person program
---

Below are links to handouts describing what is covered in the Family Science Saturdays classes. We encourage you to read the handouts to learn more about each experiment and we hope you repeat and further explore many of them at home with your siblings and friends, or at school with your classmates. Many of the experiments also make great party tricks, hint hint. Please feel free to make copies of these handouts / worksheets or distribute them electronically.

<Title>Kitchen Chemistry</Title>

<CardGroup>

<MiniCard
  title="Kitchen Chemistry Handout"
  href="LINK NEEDED"
  actionIcon="arrowDown"
/>

</CardGroup>

<Title>Polymers</Title>

<CardGroup>

<MiniCard
  title="Polymer Science Handout"
  href="LINK NEEDED"
  actionIcon="arrowDown"
/>

</CardGroup>



<Title>States of Matter: Solids, Liquids and Gases</Title>

<CardGroup>

<MiniCard
  title="States of Matter Handout"
  href="LINK NEEDED"
  actionIcon="arrowDown"
/>

</CardGroup>

<Title>Waves, Sound & Light</Title>

<CardGroup>

<MiniCard
  title="Waves, Sound & Light Handout (best printed in color, double-sided)"
  href="LINK NEEDED"
  actionIcon="arrowDown"
/>

</CardGroup>





<Title>Make-your-own</Title>

<CardGroup>

<MiniCard
  title="Bottle Music"
  href="LINK NEEDED"
  actionIcon="arrowDown"
/>

<MiniCard
  title="3-D Glasses"
  href="LINK NEEDED"
  actionIcon="arrowDown"
/>

</CardGroup>

<Title>Introduction to Electronics</Title>

<CardGroup>

<MiniCard
  title="Introduction to Electronics Handout"
  href="LINK NEEDED"
  actionIcon="arrowDown"
/>

<MiniCard
  title="Introduction to Electronics Adder Function Handout"
  href="LINK NEEDED"
  actionIcon="arrowDown"
/>

</CardGroup>




<Title>Introduction to Algorithms</Title>

<CardGroup>

<MiniCard
  title="Algorithms handout"
  href="./handouts/IBM_Family_Science_Algorithms_InClass_Handout.zip"
  actionIcon="arrowDown"
/>

<MiniCard
  title="Additional Algorithms Education"
  href="LINK NEEDED"
  actionIcon="arrowDown"
/>

</CardGroup>

---
title: In person program
---

Below are links to handouts describing what is covered in the Family Science Saturdays classes. We encourage you to read the handouts to learn more about each experiment and we hope you repeat and further explore many of them at home with your siblings and friends, or at school with your classmates. Many of the experiments also make great party tricks, hint hint. Please feel free to make copies of these handouts / worksheets or distribute them electronically.
